attributes.action: STOP giving OUR money to super rich international bankers to fix a mess THEY created.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I mean, if you owned a business and took the weeks takings and staff wages and popped off down the betting shop and blew it all you couldn't go to the government or the bank and say "I'm sorry mr bank manager, I've blown everyones money, can I have some more to cover my stupidity?".
